text: Hot is the 42nd studio album by American musician James Brown. The album was released on January 1, 1976, by Polydor Records. ==Track listing== All tracks composed by James Brown; except where indicated ==Personnel== *James Brown - lead vocals, arrangements *Dave Matthews - arrangements *Bob Both - recording supervisor, engineer *David Stone, Major Little - engineer *Michael Doret - artwork ==References== Category:1976 albums Category:James Brown albums Category:Albums arranged by David Matthews (keyboardist) Category:Albums produced by James Brown Category:Polydor Records albums
title: Hot (James Brown album)
